author: Aaron Wilgosh
title: Two Arrested After Police Vehicles Rammed in Portage
description: Two women are in custody following a dramatic series of events on Christmas Eve that left two police vehicles damaged and briefly ablaze. On Dec. 24 at 2:15 p.m., a Portage la Prairie RCMP officer attempted to stop a vehicle near 8th Street NW and 6th Avenue NW. Despite the officer activating emergency lights, the […]
